verses.verse: Yahweh <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses <WH4872> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai, <WH5514> in the Tent <WH168> of Meeting, <WH4150> on the first <WH259> day of the second <WH8145> month, <WH2320> in the second <WH8145> year <WH8141> after they had come out <WH3318> of the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> saying, <WH559>

"Take <WH5375> a census <WH7218> of all the congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> by their families, <WH4940> by their fathers <WH1>' houses, <WH1004> according to the number <WH4557> of the names, <WH8034> every male, <WH2145> one by one; <WH1538>

from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward, <WH4605> all who are able to go out <WH3318> to war <WH6635> in Israel. <WH3478> You and Aaron <WH175> shall number <WH6485> them by their divisions. <WH6635>
With you there shall be a man <WH376> of every <WH376> tribe; <WH4294> everyone <WH376> head <WH7218> of his fathers <WH1>' house. <WH1004>
These are the names <WH8034> of the men <WH582> who shall stand <WH5975> with you: <WH7205> Of Reuben: Elizur <WH468> the son <WH1121> of Shedeur. <WH7707>
Of Simeon: <WH8095> Shelumiel <WH8017> the son <WH1121> of Zurishaddai. <WH6701>
Of Judah: <WH3063> Nahshon <WH5177> the son <WH1121> of Amminadab. <WH5992>
Of Issachar: <WH3485> Nethanel <WH5417> the son <WH1121> of Zuar. <WH6686>
Of Zebulun: <WH2074> Eliab <WH446> the son <WH1121> of Helon. <WH2497>
Of the children <WH1121> of Joseph: <WH3130> Of Ephraim: <WH669> Elishama <WH476> the son <WH1121> of Ammihud. <WH5989> Of Manasseh: <WH4519> Gamaliel <WH1583> the son <WH1121> of Pedahzur. <WH6301>
Of Benjamin: <WH1144> Abidan <WH27> the son <WH1121> of Gideoni. <WH1441>
Of Dan: <WH1835> Ahiezer <WH295> the son <WH1121> of Ammishaddai. <WH5996>
Of Asher: <WH836> Pagiel <WH6295> the son <WH1121> of Ochran. <WH5918>
Of Gad: <WH1410> Eliasaph <WH460> the son <WH1121> of Deuel. <WH1845>
Of Naphtali: <WH5321> Ahira <WH299> the son <WH1121> of Enan. <WH5881>"

These are those who were <WH7148> called <WH7121> of the congregation, <WH5712> the princes <WH5387> of the tribes <WH4294> of their fathers; <WH1> they were the heads <WH7218> of the thousands <WH505> of <WH1992> Israel. <WH3478>
Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> took <WH3947> these men <WH582> who are mentioned <WH5344> by name. <WH8034>

They assembled <WH6950> all the congregation <WH5712> together <WH6950> on the first <WH259> day of the second <WH8145> month; <WH2320> and they declared their ancestry <WH3205> by their families, <WH4940> by their fathers <WH1>' houses, <WH1004> according to the number <WH4557> of the names, <WH8034> from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward, <WH4605> one by one. <WH1538>
As Yahweh <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses, <WH4872> so he numbered <WH6485> them in the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai. <WH5514>

The children <WH1121> of Reuben, <WH7205> Israel <WH3478>'s firstborn, <WH1060> their generations, <WH8435> by their families, <WH4940> by their fathers <WH1>' houses, <WH1004> according to the number <WH4557> of the names, <WH8034> one by one, <WH1538> every male <WH2145> from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward, <WH4605> all who were able to go out <WH3318> to war; <WH6635>
those who were numbered <WH6485> of them, <WH4294> of the tribe of Reuben, <WH7205> were forty <WH705> - six <WH8337> thousand <WH505> five <WH2568> hundred. <WH3967>

Of the children <WH1121> of Simeon, <WH8095> their generations, <WH8435> by their families, <WH4940> by their fathers <WH1>' houses, <WH1004> those who were numbered <WH6485> of it, <WH4557> according to the number of the names, <WH8034> one by one, <WH1538> every male <WH2145> from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward, <WH4605> all who were able to go out <WH3318> to war; <WH6635>
those who were numbered <WH6485> of them, <WH4294> of the tribe of Simeon, <WH8095> were fifty <WH2572> - nine <WH8672> thousand <WH505> three <WH7969> hundred. <WH3967>

Of the children <WH1121> of Gad, <WH1410> their generations, <WH8435> by their families, <WH4940> by their fathers <WH1>' houses, <WH1004> according to the number <WH4557> of the names, <WH8034> from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward, <WH4605> all who were able to go out <WH3318> to war; <WH6635>
those who were numbered <WH6485> of them, <WH4294> of the tribe of Gad, <WH1410> were forty <WH705> - five <WH2568> thousand <WH505> six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967> fifty. <WH2572>

Of the children <WH1121> of Judah, <WH3063> their generations, <WH8435> by their families, <WH4940> by their fathers <WH1>' houses, <WH1004> according to the number <WH4557> of the names, <WH8034> from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward, <WH4605> all who were able to go out <WH3318> to war; <WH6635>
those who were numbered <WH6485> of them, <WH4294> of the tribe of Judah, <WH3063> were seventy <WH7657> - four <WH702> thousand <WH505> six <WH8337> hundred. <WH3967>

Of the children <WH1121> of Issachar, <WH3485> their generations, <WH8435> by their families, <WH4940> by their fathers <WH1>' houses, <WH1004> according to the number <WH4557> of the names, <WH8034> from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward, <WH4605> all who were able to go out <WH3318> to war; <WH6635>
those who were numbered <WH6485> of them, <WH4294> of the tribe of Issachar, <WH3485> were fifty <WH2572> - four <WH702> thousand <WH505> four <WH702> hundred. <WH3967>

Of the children <WH1121> of Zebulun, <WH2074> their generations, <WH8435> by their families, <WH4940> by their fathers <WH1>' houses, <WH1004> according to the number <WH4557> of the names, <WH8034> from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward, <WH4605> all who were able to go out <WH3318> to war; <WH6635>
those who were numbered <WH6485> of them, <WH4294> of the tribe of Zebulun, <WH2074> were fifty <WH2572> - seven <WH7651> thousand <WH505> four <WH702> hundred. <WH3967>

Of the children <WH1121> of Joseph, <WH3130> of the children <WH1121> of Ephraim, <WH669> their generations, <WH8435> by their families, <WH4940> by their fathers <WH1>' houses, <WH1004> according to the number <WH4557> of the names, <WH8034> from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward, <WH4605> all who were able to go out <WH3318> to war; <WH6635>
those who were numbered <WH6485> of them, <WH4294> of the tribe of Ephraim, <WH669> were forty <WH705> thousand <WH505> five <WH2568> hundred. <WH3967>

Of the children <WH1121> of Manasseh, <WH4519> their generations, <WH8435> by their families, <WH4940> by their fathers <WH1>' houses, <WH1004> according to the number <WH4557> of the names, <WH8034> from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward, <WH4605> all who were able to go out <WH3318> to war; <WH6635>
those who were numbered <WH6485> of them, <WH4294> of the tribe of Manasseh, <WH4519> were thirty <WH7970> - two <WH8147> thousand <WH505> two hundred. <WH3967>

Of the children <WH1121> of Benjamin, <WH1144> their generations, <WH8435> by their families, <WH4940> by their fathers <WH1>' houses, <WH1004> according to the number <WH4557> of the names, <WH8034> from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward, <WH4605> all who were able to go out <WH3318> to war; <WH6635>
those who were numbered <WH6485> of them, <WH4294> of the tribe of Benjamin, <WH1144> were thirty <WH7970> - five <WH2568> thousand <WH505> four <WH702> hundred. <WH3967>

Of the children <WH1121> of Dan, <WH1835> their generations, <WH8435> by their families, <WH4940> by their fathers <WH1>' houses, <WH1004> according to the number <WH4557> of the names, <WH8034> from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward, <WH4605> all who were able to go forth <WH3318> to war; <WH6635>
those who were numbered <WH6485> of them, <WH4294> of the tribe of Dan, <WH1835> were sixty <WH8346> - two <WH8147> thousand <WH505> seven <WH7651> hundred. <WH3967>

Of the children <WH1121> of Asher, <WH836> their generations, <WH8435> by their families, <WH4940> by their fathers <WH1>' houses, <WH1004> according to the number <WH4557> of the names, <WH8034> from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward, <WH4605> all who were able to go forth <WH3318> to war; <WH6635>
those who were numbered <WH6485> of them, <WH4294> of the tribe of Asher, <WH836> were forty <WH705> - one <WH259> thousand <WH505> five <WH2568> hundred. <WH3967>

Of the children <WH1121> of Naphtali, <WH5321> their generations, <WH8435> by their families, <WH4940> by their fathers <WH1>' houses, <WH1004> according to the number <WH4557> of the names, <WH8034> from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward, <WH4605> all who were able to go forth <WH3318> to war; <WH6635>
those who were numbered <WH6485> of them, <WH4294> of the tribe of Naphtali, <WH5321> were fifty <WH2572> - three <WH7969> thousand <WH505> four <WH702> hundred. <WH3967>

These are those who were numbered, <WH6485> whom Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> numbered, <WH6485> and the princes <WH5387> of Israel, <WH3478> being twelve <WH6240> men: <WH376> they were each <WH376> one <WH259> for his fathers <WH1>' house. <WH1004>

So all those who were numbered <WH6485> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> by their fathers <WH1>' houses, <WH1004> from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward, <WH4605> all who were able to go out <WH3318> to war <WH6635> in Israel; <WH3478>
even all those who were numbered <WH6485> were six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967> three <WH7969> thousand <WH505> five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967> fifty. <WH2572>
But the Levites <WH3881> after the tribe <WH4294> of their fathers <WH1> were not numbered <WH6485> among them. <WH8432>
For Yahweh <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>
"Only the tribe <WH4294> of Levi <WH3878> you shall not number, <WH6485> neither shall you take <WH5375> a census <WH7218> of them among <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Israel; <WH3478>

but appoint <WH6485> the Levites <WH3881> over the Tabernacle <WH4908> of the Testimony, <WH5715> and over all its furnishings, <WH3627> and over all that belongs to it. <WH5375> They shall carry the tabernacle, <WH4908> and all its furnishings; <WH3627> and they shall take care <WH8334> of it, <WH2583> and shall encamp around <WH5439> it. <WH4908>

When the tabernacle <WH4908> is to move, <WH5265> the Levites <WH3881> shall take it down; <WH3381> and when the tabernacle <WH4908> is to be set up, <WH2583> the Levites <WH3881> shall set it up. <WH6965> The stranger <WH2114> who comes near <WH7131> shall be put to death. <WH4191>

The children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> shall pitch their tents, <WH2583> every man <WH376> by his own camp, <WH4264> and every man <WH376> by his own standard, <WH1714> according to their divisions. <WH6635>

But the Levites <WH3881> shall encamp <WH2583> around <WH5439> the Tabernacle <WH4908> of the Testimony, <WH5715> that there may be no wrath <WH7110> on the congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478> and the Levites <WH3881> shall be <WH8104> responsible <WH4931> for the Tabernacle <WH4908> of the Testimony. <WH5715>"
Thus the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> did. <WH6213> According to all that Yahweh <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses, <WH4872> so they did. <WH6213>
